description.value: You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unblinking Flame Ignition] for Unblinking Flame, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unbreaking Wave Containment] for Unbreaking Waves, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfolding Wind Crash] for Unfolding Wind, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Untwisting Iron Pillar] for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become a master in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.

value.value: Perfect Ki Expert or Perfect Ki Exemplar
